short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HashDit Browser Extension to make your crypto journey much safer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What Is HashDit?
HashDit is a Web3 Security Firm focused on providing a safe ecosystem for all users. HashDit's API integration extends its influence to numerous prominent applications, anchoring active measures to safeguard users from the clutches of fraudulent activities. 
- PancakeSwap leverages HashDit for automatic token scams, enabling users to access real-time risk levels. 
- HashDit's API also takes center stage within the TrustWallet Security Scanner. It preempts elevated risks by promptly notifying users before they connect to a dApp or execute transactions.

The HashDit Extension analyzes each transaction you initiate in real-time, we mitigate risks and threats such as phishing attempts, fraud of all types or scams.

What can HashDit do for you?
- Phishing and Scam website detection
- Detects wallet drainers before connecting your wallet
- Warnings on malicious transactions and signatures
- Human readable transaction and signature insights

HashDit will never access your seed phrase or private key which means we can never access your wallet. 

Your data privacy is very important to us.
